wordGroup: intrinsic viscosity 特性粘度；固有粘度；本征粘度
intrinsic motivation 内在动机；内在激励
intrinsic safety 内在安全，本质安全
intrinsic property 本征性质，固有特性
intrinsic factor 内在因素；[医]（造血）内因子
intrinsic activity [化]固有活性；内在活性
intrinsic function 内部函数；内在函数；固有功能

sentences.en: Diamonds have little intrinsic value and their price depends almost entirely on their scarcity.
sentences.cn: 钻石没有多少内在价值，它们的价格几乎完全取决于其稀有程度。

sentences.en: It's got extrinsic and intrinsic value for me.
sentences.cn: 对我来说，它有外在和内在的价值。

sentences.en: Let me introduce a couple of technical terms: extrinsic value and intrinsic value.
sentences.cn: 让我来介绍几个术语：外在价值和内在价值。
